applyTo: '**'
---
Provide project context and coding guidelines that AI should follow when generating code, answering questions, or reviewing changes.

Ignore all visual decorations, emojis, stickers, or any kind of playful or colorful elements. 
When generating code or text, output only clean, concise, and standard code or text. 
Do not add comments that are for decoration, jokes, or visual effects. 
Focus purely on the functional content.
